page_3.text: Suddenly, Zoe landed on a wobbly, jelly-like planet! “Hello!” chirped a friendly alien with three eyes. “Welcome to Glimmerland!”
page_3.scene: Zoe stands on the bouncy, jelly-like surface, gazing at a cheerful three-eyed alien wearing a colorful scarf, surrounded by sparkling trees.

character.name: Zoe
character.description: Zoe is a lively 6-year-old girl with big, bright eyes and curly hair. She wears a sparkly space helmet and a rainbow tutu, reflecting her imaginative spirit.
